name: Exploration 02: 2021 Global Game Jam
description:
You've dropped your socket into your car and must now retrieve it by pulling the car apart. Click, hold, and drag away to pull off parts. Click on powerups as they float by.

I programmed the game. The two others I worked with handled the audio and the art.

GGJ: https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/socket-quest-9
